hadiths.text: Abu Sa'id Khudri (Allah be pleased with him) reported Allah's Apostle (ﷺ) as saying:A woman should not set out on a journey extending beyond three nights but with a Mahram

chapter.ara-name: باب سَفَرِ الْمَرْأَةِ مَعَ مَحْرَمٍ إِلَى حَجٍّ وَغَيْرِهِ
chapter.eng-name: A woman travelling with a Mahram for Hajj and other purposes
